title: When Lux is nerfed I am confident the following champs will be mid
body:
Akali (as you all learned I was correct about after my prediction a month ago)
Katharina. "Lol low elo pubstomper" just like akali, will be back. 
Lissandra because she is the only mage with a hope in hell of keeping these two in check.
Malzahar for the same reason as lissandra and the fact he can E a minion and wave clear akali and kat.


So be careful who you ask to be nerfed GD. Lux is keeping these shits from dominating mid.
